github.githubToken: Environment variable name containing GitHub token used by gh CLI.
github.repository: GitHub repository override used for releases (supports owner/repo or full GitHub URL).

nuget.nugetApiKey: Environment variable name containing NuGet API key.
nuget.source: NuGet feed URL passed to dotnet nuget push.

branches.release: Branch that requires tag and allows full publish flow.
branches.dev: Branch for local/dev build flow (no tag required).

paths.csprojPaths: List of project files used for version discovery and publish output.
paths.testResultsDir: Directory where test artifacts are written.
paths.stagingDir: Temporary staging directory before archive creation.
paths.releaseDir: Output directory for release archives and artifacts.
paths.changelogPath: Path to CHANGELOG.md used for version and release notes extraction.
paths.testProject: Test project path used by TestRunner.

release.releaseTitlePattern: GitHub release title pattern. Supports {version} placeholder.
